title: Test Selection Rules
description: Configuration for test selection based on changed paths

ignorePaths.description: Glob patterns for files that should be completely ignored (no test triggers, no fallback)

triggerAllPaths.description: Glob patterns for critical files - if any match, ALL tests run

testProjectPatterns.description: Patterns to identify test projects from affected project paths

sourceToTestMappings.description: Mappings from source file patterns to test project patterns

categories.description: Test categories with their trigger rules

exclude.description: Glob patterns to exclude from matches

sourceToTestMapping.description: Maps source paths to test projects using pattern substitution

source.description: Glob pattern with {name} placeholder for source files

test.description: Pattern with {name} placeholder for test project path

exclude.description: Glob patterns for paths to exclude from this mapping

triggerPaths.description: Glob patterns - if any match, category is triggered

excludePaths.description: Glob patterns - matching files are excluded from triggering this category
